article_title: Kentucky's struggles with drug abuse take higher profile in U.S. Senate race
article_text: News about the expansion of a federal anti-drug program in Kentucky on Monday provided U.S. Senate Minority Leader Mitch McConnell an opportunity to tout his record on an issue that has taken on a higher profile recently in his race against Democrat Alison Lundergan Grimes.
